content: The character Mina Harker appears in which classic horror novel by Bram Stoker?

Mina Harker is a character in the classic horror novel "Dracula" by Bram Stoker. Published in 1897, "Dracula" is considered one of the most influential works of Gothic literature and has had a profound impact on popular culture, particularly in the depiction of vampires. Mina Harker is one of the central characters in the novel, known for her intelligence, resourcefulness, and moral integrity. She is married to Jonathan Harker and plays a crucial role in the fight against Count Dracula.
